|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAAZU4431824 |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This product is a PCIe to Mini PCIe adapter for an [[Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 7260 (7260HMW)]].
Reviews online say that the card requires a USB header from the motherboard.
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:GC-WB867D-I rev 2.0 01.jpg| File:GC-WB867D-I rev 2.0 02.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]]
